path = untar_data(URLs.MNIST_TINY)
dls = ImageDataLoaders.from_folder(path)
learn = cnn_learner(dls, resnet18, pretrained=False)

Event types

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Events[source]

Events(d)

{% endraw %}

Available events

clientEvents define the actions managed by the web client:

{% raw %} 
clientEvents

Events (
  SEND_DATA: socket/socketReceiveData
  INVALID_EVENT: socket/socketInvalidEvent
  SEND_IMAGE_INPUT: socket/socketReceiveImageInput
  CLOSE_CLIENT: socket/socketServerClosed
)
{% endraw %}

serverEvents define the actions managed by the FastExplorer server.

{% raw %} 
serverEvents

Events (
  RECEIVE_EVENT: socket/sendEvent
)
{% endraw %}

Server

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class FastExplorer[source]

FastExplorer(learn, host='0.0.0.0', port=8000)

Wrapper around Representation and ProxyServer.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Learner.fastexplorer[source]

Learner.fastexplorer(reload=False, host='0.0.0.0', port=8000)

{% endraw %}

header_data_from_array_1_0[source]

header_data_from_array_1_0(array, typ)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
xb,yb = dls.one_batch()
xx = xb.cpu().numpy()[0,0]
xx.shape

(28, 28)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
_get_numpy_bytes(xx, clientEvents.SEND_IMAGE_INPUT)[:128]

b"\x93NUMPY\x01\x00v\x00{'descr': '<f4', 'fortran_order': False, 'shape': (28, 28), 'type': 'socket/socketReceiveImageInput', }              \n"
{% endraw %}

Events handlers

Functions defined here are sended by the web client in upper case (eg:LOAD_INPUT)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
